title: ATrevido
description: Andone Trevido grew up surrounded by money, drugs, and murder. He was only eighteen when his parents were killed execution style, thrusting him into the role as the head of the Galician Crime Family. Thinking him weak, his enemies challenge his resolve by targeting what remains of Andone’s broken family. They thought he would break. That was their fatal mistake. Andone’s retaliation centers around his rival’s daughter. But he never intended to fall for her. With his mind clouded by burning desire, Andone struggles to uncover who among his trusted inner circle betrayed him. One way or another, he will ensure all who crossed him pay for their deceit. Danger and romance collide in ATrevido, a dark mafia romance written by award-winning author Angel Rose!
author: Angel   Rose
